vsParam:
Huh? I didn't expect to see Ru Sensei here.
It seems there's something on his mind...
Ru Sensei, what are you doing here?

Oh, it's you. I've been investigating the monster
that haunts "Woofer Village".

Let me see... It's a silver "Puni Puni?" that haunts
the neighborhood... Right?

No... It does look like a silver Puni Puni,
but it's not.

The "Puni Puni?" around here is known to
be timid and inactive...

But this monster around Woofer Village is very aggressive.
We got lots of reports about villagers being attacked by it.

Lord Rose Hip of Ribrum went to investigate and
he got attacked too.

Thank god we repelled the monster...
Anyway, I want to investigate in person.

Eh, you're going there by yourself?
What if you get hurt?

What are you talking about? What do you take me for?!
I have much more combat experience than you.

I've looked through all the reports on this monster.
And I remember every single trait of the monsters that I've defeated.

Sorel, Ru Sensei may look like a kid,
but it's rude of you to make such a joke!

Never mind...
Nice talking with you guys. I'm off to investigate.

Ah, let us give you a hand!
We can't stand by and do nothing while Woofer Village is in trouble!

Oh, thank you. But this monster is known for its ability to
persevere in battle just like "Puni Punis?". Don't underrate it.

Got it.
[px], let's hurry to Woofer Village now!
